slashCommands.name: edit
slashCommands.description: Edit code in the current file

slashCommands.name: comment
slashCommands.description: Write comments for the selected code

customCommands.name: refactor
customCommands.prompt: Refactor the selected code to improve readability, maintainability, and performance while preserving functionality. Focus on React Native and TypeScript best practices.
customCommands.description: Refactor code with React Native best practices

customCommands.name: debug
customCommands.prompt: Analyze the selected code for potential bugs, performance issues, and suggest improvements. Pay special attention to React Native specific issues like memory leaks, state management, and navigation problems.

customCommands.name: test
customCommands.prompt: Generate comprehensive unit tests for the selected code using Jest and React Native Testing Library. Include edge cases and error scenarios.

customCommands.name: optimize
customCommands.prompt: Optimize the selected React Native code for performance, focusing on re-renders, memory usage, and bundle size. Suggest modern React Native patterns and hooks.
